scripts.start: unset NODE_OPTIONS && export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts start
scripts.build: unset NODE_OPTIONS && export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts build
scripts.test: unset NODE_OPTIONS && export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts test
scripts.eject: unset NODE_OPTIONS && export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts eject
